column2: ["4 medium Russet potatoes, mashed", "1/3 stick butter", "3 Tbsp. milk", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Add mashed potatoes, butter and milk.", "Let cool.", "Once cool, add 1 cup flour.", "Knead until smooth.", "Heat electric frypan to 400\u00b0.", "Take a large spoonful and roll it out until it is flat and thin (but thick enough to pick up with a spatula).", "\"Fry\" dry (no oil in pan); turn and bake other side.", "Should have light brown spots, but be soft and flexible."]

column2: ["leftover mashed potatoes", "chopped onion (if desired)", "1 egg", "2 Tbsp. flour"]
column3: ["Mix well; shape into patties. Fry until brown on one side, then turn."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "1 c. milk", "4 Tbsp. mayonnaise (1/4 c.)"]
column3: ["Mix all together and spoon into muffin pans which have been sprayed.", "Bake 15 minutes at 400\u00b0."]

column2: ["2 whole chicken breasts, split, boned and skinned", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1/2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. chicken broth", "1/4 c. half and half", "1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard"]
column3: ["Saute chicken in butter over low heat about 20 minutes or until tender.", "Remove chicken to a warm platter.", "Blend flour into pan drippings; cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until bubbly.", "Gradually stir in broth and half and half; cook until smooth and thickened, stirring constantly.", "Stir in mustard.", "Add chicken; cover and simmer about 10 minutes.", "Yield:", "2 servings."]

column1: Make Ahead Mashed Or Whipped Potatoes

column3: ["Pare and cook potatoes as usual, adding salt.", "Drain and whip them.", "Whip in cream cheese and sour cream.", "Place in casserole, cover and place in refrigerator until ready to cook.", "Spread with butter and paprika.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Great for the holidays when time is limited."]

column2: ["1 stick butter", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix and roll into a ball.", "Put small amount in each cup and press around to make a shell.", "In the bottom of each, put chopped walnuts."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Mix and put in greased muffin pans.", "Serve hot with butter. Tastes great!", "Really!"]

column2: ["1/4 c. butter", "3 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix together until the dough is workable."]

column2: ["2 sticks butter, melted", "2 c. self-rising flour", "1 c. sour cream"]

column2: ["1 egg", "1 slice bread", "butter"]

Put slice of bread in pan.", "Crack egg into center hole of bread. Turn when egg is set.", "Cook over low heat until egg is done. Season with salt and pepper.", "Serve with bread hole covering egg center (Toad)!"]

column1: Real Mashed Potatoes!(From Potatoes, Not A Mix!)
column2: ["20 potatoes (approximate)", "1/2 stick butter", "little milk"]
column3: ["Cut up potatoes and put in a big pot of salted water. Bring to a boil. Put cover on pot and let cook 25 minutes on medium heat. Drain; add butter and milk. Whip using a hand mixer."]

column2: ["8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "8 oz. sour cream", "1 small onion, finely chopped"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients and spread into serving dish or 9 x 13-inch or larger pizza pan.", "Top with shredded lettuce, grated Cheddar cheese and chopped tomatoes.", "Chill for at least 1 hour. Serve with tortilla chips."]

column2: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1 1/2 to 2 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Melt butter and flour; stir 3 to 4 minutes until blended. Slowly stir in milk.", "Cook and stir until thick and smooth."]

column2: ["1 c. sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. diced tomatoes", "1 lb. bacon, fry and crumble"]
column3: ["Let chill about 1 hour.", "Serve on crackers or cocktail rye."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "2 Tbsp. melted butter", "milk (enough to make a good consistency)"]
column3: ["In mixing bowl, combine flour and butter, stirring butter into flour and then add milk to desired consistency.", "Batter should not be thin but have a texture that will hold its shape when out on flour surface (wax paper)."]

column2: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1 medium onion", "5 c. milk", "6 slices cooked, crumbled bacon", "1 pkg. Crab Delights (flakes or chunks)", "1 c. sliced celery", "2 Tbsp. flour", "3 large potatoes (1/2-inch slices)"]
column3: ["Melt butter in saucepan.", "Stir in celery and chopped onion; cook until tender.", "Stir in flour, salt and pepper, if desired. Gradually add milk, stirring constantly.", "Add potatoes.", "Bring to boil; simmer 15 minutes, until potatoes are tender.", "Add bacon and Crab Delights.", "Heat 3 to 5 minutes more.", "Makes 4 servings."]

column2: ["1 large cream cheese", "1 slice onion, chopped super fine", "3 Tbsp. canned milk"]
column3: ["At room temperature, cream onion, cheese and canned cream together.", "Add more cream, if too thick.", "Serve with chips."]

column2: ["6 - 8 potatoes", "6 slices bacon", "1/2 cup onion, chopped", "1/2 cup bell pepper, chopped"]
column3: ["Bake potatoes.", "Let cool.", "Peel and cube.", "In large skillet, fry bacon.", "Remove bacon and allow to cool, then crumble.", "Saute onions and peppers in bacon drippings.", "Add potatoes and stir, heating thoroughly.", "Add bacon last.", "Serve while hot."]

column2: ["2 c. flour", "1 stick butter", "1 pt. sour cream"]
column3: ["Add all ingredients together.", "Roll small balls together and pat.", "Place on lightly greased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 for 20 minutes or until done."]

column2: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 lb. stick butter", "1 c. unsifted flour"]
column3: ["Into a medium mixing bowl, turn cheese and butter.", "Let stand at room temperature to soften. With a wooden spoon, blend thoroughly. Gradually work in flour.", "Press dough flat in bowl and refrigerate about 30 minutes.", "With a knife or spatula, mark off dough into 24 equal portions.", "Roll each portion into a ball, then press over bottom and sides (up to top) of small muffin pan cups, each about 1 3/4-inches in diameter.", "Use as directed in recipe for Crab Tarts.", "Makes 24 tarts."]

column2: ["large pkg. cream cheese", "cups flour, sifted", "lb. butter"]
column3: ["Cream the cream cheese and butter together; add flour and knead.", "Cover and put in refrigerator for at least 3 hours.", "Cut dough into quarters. Roll out on powdered sugar 1/8-inch thick. Cut into 2-inch squares.", "Fill.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes."]

column2: ["6 medium potatoes, cooked", "2 c. sour cream", "1 small jar Cheez Whiz", "1 tsp. minced onion"]

column2: ["1 cup self rising flour", "1 cup sour cream", "1/2 cup butter"]

column2: ["5 lb. potatoes", "1 large onion, chopped (optional)", "1 stick butter or oleo", "milk for mashing"]
column3: ["Peel, cook and dice potatoes.", "Cook chopped onion in milk. Do not let boil.", "Melt stick of butter in hot onion milk mixture. Mash potatoes with the hot onion milk butter mixture.", "Beat until creamy.", "Put cool potatoes in individual packages and store in freezer.", "When ready to use, thaw out,", "place in Corning Ware dish and reheat in a steamer.", "Will taste like fresh mashed potatoes."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "as much milk as needed"]

column3: ["Mix well by hand until no more yellow or white shows.", "Flatten out, wrap in waxed paper and store in refrigerator overnight."]

column2: ["1 c. flour", "1 egg, well beaten", "2 Tbsp. milk"]

column2: ["1 egg", "1 slice bread (raw toast will do)", "butter"]

column2: ["36 medium to large mushrooms", "2 (8 oz.) whipped cream cheese and chives", "2 Tbsp. melted butter", "8 slices crisp bacon, crumbled"]

column2: ["2 cans stewed tomatoes, mashed well", "1 large onion, minced", "garlic, salt and pepper to taste", "self-rising flour (enough to make a stiff batter)"]
column3: ["Mix and drop by spoonfuls into hot fat.", "Drain on paper towels.", "Good with seafood."]

column2: ["4 chicken breasts or thighs, skin removed", "1 c. flour seasoned with salt and pepper", "1 egg, beaten"]
column3: ["Pat chicken pieces dry with a paper towel; dip each piece first into seasoned flour, shaking to remove excess flour.", "Then dip into the egg and back into the seasoned flour.", "Quickly brown pieces in about 1/4-inch oil on medium-high heat.", "After both sides of the chicken are browned, place on a broiler pan (to allow the juices to run through) in a preheated 375\u00b0 oven for 25 to 30 minutes.", "The chicken is done when juices run clear when chicken is pierced."]

column2: ["2 pt. sour cream", "2 c. mayonnaise", "2 envelopes Hidden Valley Ranch original dressing", "2 boxes frozen, chopped spinach", "1 loaf unsliced pumpernickel bread"]
column3: ["Thaw, rinse and drain spinach.", "Mix sour cream, mayonnaise, dressing and spinach.", "Chill mixture several hours or overnight. Remove center from loaf of bread and fill with dip.", "Cut center section into squares for dipping."]

column2: ["2 lb. ground beef, browned", "2 c. celery, sliced", "2 c. carrots, sliced", "2 c. potatoes, diced"]

column2: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 egg, beaten", "1 can Van Camp's Spanish rice"]

column2: ["1/2 lb. ground beef", "1/2 lb. bacon, cut into small pieces", "1 small onion, diced"]

column2: ["1 (1 oz.) pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch milk recipe original Ranch dressing", "4 c. mashed potatoes", "butter or margarine"]

column2: ["2 c. grated potatoes, drained", "1/4 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 egg"]

column2: ["1 lb. large mushrooms", "1 small onion", "8 strips bacon", "1 (16 oz.) pkg. cream cheese"]

Chop mushroom stems and onion.", "Set aside.", "Chop raw bacon and fry until almost done.", "Add onions and stems.", "Continue to fry until done.", "Drain bacon and onion mixture.", "Place in food processor (I just mix mine well), add room temperature cream cheese, and mix well.", "Put heaping spoonfuls of mixture into mushroom caps.", "Place on cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes.", "Serve immediately."]

column2: ["1 c. milk", "5 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "2 c. self-rising flour"]

column2: ["1 loaf French bread, sliced 1/4-inch thick", "butter", "garlic powder"]
column3: ["Spread butter evenly on bread slices, taking to edges of bread. Sprinkle with garlic powder and cut into cubes. Bake at 350\u00b0 until crispy. Store in airtight bags. Will keep for several days."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Combine ingredients. Drop into greased and floured muffin tins. Bake at 400\u00b0 until golden brown. Makes 12 muffins."]

column2: ["2 c. unsifted flour", "1/2 lb. butter", "12 oz. cream cheese"]
column3: ["Sift flour in large bowl.", "Cut in butter as for pie dough. Cut in cheese and mix until a ball is formed.", "Refrigerate for 24 hours or more.", "Divide dough in half.", "Roll on floured surface. Cut in 3 x 3-inch pieces.", "Place apricot filling in center, over lap corners.", "Bake on greased cookie sheet at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 14 minutes.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar."]

column2: ["1 large onion", "1 1/2 to 2 lb. ground beef", "7 large peeled and sliced potatoes", "1 can sliced carrots (fresh carrots, optional)"]
column3: ["Slice onion and place on bottom of 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Make hamburger patties out of ground beef and place on top of onion.", "Spread sliced potatoes evenly over hamburger patties.", "Add carrots on top.", "Add salt and pepper to taste.", "Cover and cook at 375\u00b0 until meat is done (45 minutes or until done) and potatoes are tender."]

column2: ["1 fresh turkey", "butter, melted", "flour"]
column3: ["Rinse turkey and pat dry.", "Melt butter and add flour to make a paste.", "(Paste should be heavy enough to stick to turkey without falling off.)", "Prepare grill for indirect cooking with pan under turkey.", "While coals are heating, cover turkey in paste.", "This prevents the need for basting.", "Cook turkey on grill for 13 minutes a pound, or until it reads 170\u00b0 on meat thermometer.", "(Don't touch bone with thermometer.)", "Add 8 coals per side every hour until turkey cooks.", "This turkey is moist and beautifully pink edged with good smoky flavor."]

column2: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter or margarine"]
column3: ["Let cream cheese and butter soften to room temperature.", "Blend cream cheese and butter well; add flour.", "Chill.", "This makes dough easier to work with.", "Use miniature muffin pans.", "Pinch off marble size balls and shape in muffin pans."]

column2: ["1 cup self rising flour", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/2 cup milk"]

column2: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. mustard", "chopped onion or chives"]

column2: ["1/2 c. butter", "3 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. flour"]

column3: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Place in petite muffin pans or drop on baking sheet.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

column2: ["1 1/2 c. flour", "1 egg", "1/2 to 3/4 c. milk"]

column2: ["tomatoes", "milk", "egg", "flour or cracker crumbs"]
column3: ["Either ripe or green tomatoes may be used; green tomatoes just beginning to turn are very good in flavor and they are firm for slicing."]

column2: ["1/2 lb. butter (cannot be whipped variety)", "1/2 lb. cream cheese (cannot be whipped)", "2 c. flour"]
column3: ["Knead together all ingredients.", "Wrap and refrigerate overnight.", "Work with part of dough at a time so remaining dough stays cold.", "Roll out dough on sugar.", "Cut into squares.", "Fill each square with strawberry or apricot jam.", "Fold each square over jam to form a triangle.", "Press edge with a fork.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes."]

column2: ["4 c. sifted flour", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 lb. butter or margarine"]

column2: ["1 1/4 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 lb. butter", "1 c. sifted flour"]
column3: ["Cut cream cheese and butter into flour.", "Work with the combination until it clings together in a ball.", "Chill well in the refrigerator.", "Roll cream cheese pastry out into a thin layer on a lightly floured board.", "Cut into small circles.", "Place a small amount of strawberry jam on each.", "Fold pastry over and crimp edges together with a fork.", "Brush tops with milk and sprinkle lightly with a mixture of cinnamon and sugar and finely chopped nuts.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 for about 10 minutes or until lightly browned.", "Makes about 12 tarts."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour for 6 rolls (for 12; increase to 2 c. flour)", "1 heaping Tbsp. mayonnaise", "milk (enough to make gooey dough)"]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 c. milk", "1/4 c. mayonnaise"]

column2: ["1 lb. ground beef", "4 medium potatoes, cut into 4 parts each", "steak seasoning", "4 washed and scraped carrots, split into 4 parts each", "1 medium bell pepper, cut into 4 parts"]

On each piece of foil, put a patty, 4 parts carrot, 1 part bell pepper and 4 parts potato.", "Fold foil, tucking at the top seam and ends.", "Place on hot barbecue grill for 20 to 25 minutes, turning only once.", "Makes a meal for 4.", "Excellent for picnics and camping. Delicious."]

column2: ["1 slice bread", "garlic salt", "butter"]

column2: ["1 slice bread", "cooked bacon", "1 egg", "butter"]

Remove the muffin pan from the oven using hot pads.", "(Make sure there is an adult there to supervise.)"]

column3: ["Wash potatoes good.", "Cut in rings with potato peel left on potatoes.", "Place in a 9 x 13-inch pan (glass or aluminum).", "Cut onion up in rings.", "Break apart and place over potatoes (you can do this by layers if you want).", "Then cut up butter in pieces; place on potatoes and onion.", "Cover with foil and bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour or until desired tenderness."]

column2: ["2 qt. mushrooms", "1 bowl cream cheese", "8 slices bacon"]
column3: ["De-stem mushrooms and wash thoroughly.", "Cook bacon.", "Combine bacon and cream cheese.", "Stuff mushrooms with the combined cream cheese and bacon.", "Place on buttered baking pan and cook for 15 to 20 minutes at 325\u00b0."]

column2: ["1 stick butter, softened", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix and shape into 24 balls and press with thumb into tart pans."]

column2: ["2 chicken breasts, boned, skinned, cooked and shredded", "2 c. medium cheddar cheese, grated", "8 oz. sour cream"]
column3: ["Mix filling ingredients and chill in refrigerator."]

column2: ["2 Tbsp. bell pepper, chopped", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 tsp. minced garlic (optional)", "1 1/4 c. ketchup", "Dash of Chili powder"]
column3: ["In small skillet, saute bell pepper and onion,1 to 2 minutes. Add garlic, ketchup and Chili powder. Mix well. Heat thoroughly. Makes about 1 1/2 cups sauce."]

column2: ["3 strips bacon", "1 (16 oz.) can stewed tomatoes", "1 to 1 1/4 c. rice"]
column3: ["Fry bacon and remove from pan.", "Add tomatoes.", "Add rice and stir.", "Simmer for approximately 30 minutes or until rice is done. Crumble fried bacon on top of rice."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing", "1/2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Roll or pat on floured surface. Cut with biscuit cutter or glass.", "Place in lightly greased baking dish and bake at 400\u00b0 until golden brown."]

column2: ["5 to 6 large firm potatoes, diced", "5 to 6 large carrots, sliced", "5 short celery stalks, diced", "1 small onion, diced"]
column3: ["Put all ingredients in pot.", "Fill with cold water to cover. Keep water level covering vegetables until about 10 to 15 minutes before being done.", "Continue cooking with water at 3/4 level.", "Add salt to taste.", "Add beef bouillon cubes to taste.", "Cook at medium heat (do not boil) for 45 minutes or until done.", "Mash with hand potato masher until just slightly lumpy.", "Goes well with cornbread."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "1 c. milk", "1/4 c. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Combine all ingredients in a bowl.", "Stir until mixed.", "Spoon into a greased muffin pan.", "Bake in a preheated oven at 400\u00b0", "for 12 to 15 minutes or until brown.", "Makes 10 biscuits."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising white corn meal mix", "3/4 c. milk", "1 egg, beaten", "1 small onion, finely chopped"]
column3: ["Combine all ingredients and mix well.", "Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls into deep, hot oil at 375\u00b0, frying only a few at a time, until golden brown.", "Drain on absorbent paper.", "Yields about 2 dozen hush puppies."]

column1: Bullseye(A Fun Way To Serve Children Eggs)
column2: ["1 egg (per serving)", "butter", "1 slice white or rye bread (per serving)"]
column3: ["First prepare the bread by cutting a hole in the middle of the slice.", "Use a water glass or child's plastic cup."]

column2: ["1 pkg. (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 stick butter/margarine, softened", "1 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Beat cream cheese and butter at medium speed of an electric mixer until creamy.", "Gradually add flour, beating at low speed until blended.", "Spoon dough into ungreased mini muffin pans, filling full.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until golden.", "Serve immediately.", "Yields:", "1 1/2 doz."]

column2: ["1 loaf unsliced French bread", "5 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled", "2 c. shredded mozzarella cheese", "1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted"]
column3: ["Cut bread into 1 inch thick slices.", "Place sliced loaf on a large piece of foil.", "Combine bacon and cheese.", "Place between bread slices.", "Drizzle butter over loaf.", "Wrap in foil and bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

column2: ["pkg. tortillas", "2 pkg. cream cheese (regular or low-fat)", "1 (16 oz.) salsa"]
column3: ["Spread cream cheese over tortillas.", "Roll tortillas and cut into small segments.", "Serve tortillas with salsa for dipping!"]

column2: ["1 c. flour", "1/2 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Stir up and put in muffin tin."]

column2: ["1/2 lb. melted butter", "1/2 pt. sour cream", "2 heaping c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix and roll above ingredients in four balls; refrigerate overnight.", "Roll each ball into a pie shape.", "Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon.", "Cut each into 16 triangles.", "Fill with fruit jam, nuts and raisins.", "Grease sheet; bake at 375\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

column2: ["1 Tbsp. diced onion", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "4 c. chicken broth", "1 egg, slightly beaten"]
column3: ["Cook onion and celery in broth until tender.", "Slowly pour beaten egg into boiling broth, stirring so egg separates into shreds.", "Yields 4 cups (4 servings)."]

column2: ["2 sticks butter (no substitutes)", "1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream", "2 c. self-rising flour, unsifted"]
column3: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Melt butter in a large saucepan.", "Add sour cream and flour to butter; mix.", "Drop batter into miniature, ungreased muffin tins.", "Fill to the top.", "Bake 25 minutes."]

column2: ["1 lb. bacon", "8 oz. sour cream", "2 tomatoes", "1 1/2 c. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Cook bacon crisp and dice.", "Dice tomatoes.", "Mix all ingredients 1 day ahead and serve with toast or crackers."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "2 sticks butter", "8 oz. sour cream"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients and put in muffin pan.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 until brown."]

column2: ["6 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 lb. butter", "2 c. flour"]
column3: ["Cream butter and cheese.", "Mix in flour.", "Form into a ball. Chill in freezer for 1 hour.", "Break off small ball of dough and fit into greased mini tart pans."]

column2: ["1 slice bread", "1 egg", "butter"]
column3: ["Butter both sides of bread after tearing out a hole (in the center", "of the slice) about the size of the egg yolk.", "Put bread in frying pan and then break egg into hole.", "Cook slowly and flip to", "finish", "cooking", "egg.", "Salt and pepper to taste. Serve."]

column2: ["8 potatoes, boiled and drained", "butter", "1 c. sour cream", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese"]
column3: ["Mash potatoes and add butter, sour cream and cream cheese. Blend well.", "Place in a casserole dish and bake 45 minutes at 325\u00b0.", "You can add cheese and paprika."]

column2: ["1 egg", "1 c. self-rising flour", "2 or 3 slices bread", "1/2 to 1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Mix egg, flour and milk (add milk slowly) to make mixture like pancake batter.", "Cut bread diagonal and dip in batter and drop into hot oil (in a Fry Daddy or skillet).", "Cook to golden brown and turn and cook other side to golden brown.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar and add syrup."]

column2: ["1 pkg. bacon, cut in pieces", "2 potatoes, diced", "1 onion, chopped"]
column3: ["Cover with water and boil."]

column2: ["4 to 6 boneless skinless chicken breasts", "1 can cooked, sliced white potatoes", "1 small jar sliced mushrooms", "6 to 8 slices bacon"]
column3: ["Cook chicken in frying pan until done.", "May use oil or butter or a combination.", "Place potatoes, mushrooms and bacon in a broiler pan under broiler in oven.", "Cook 5 minutes, then turn and cook 5 minutes more or until bacon is done.", "Serve potatoes, mushrooms and bacon over chicken."]

column2: ["1 c. flour", "1 c. milk", "1 egg"]
column3: ["Mix well in a food processor or with a hand mixer.", "Cook crepes in a Teflon pan.", "Cool with paper toweling between each crepe.", "The crepes may be wrapped in plastic wrap and frozen at this point."]

column2: ["reed potatoes (1 to 2 per person)", "1 large onion", "bacon"]
column3: ["Clean and cut potatoes in half. Place in greased baking pan. Slice onion in rings and place on top of potatoes, then salt and pepper to taste."]

column2: ["1 small pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients and separate into approximately 1-inch balls.", "Spread balls around bottom and edge of small muffin tins."]

column2: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "6 medium size mushrooms", "1/8 tsp. garlic powder or to taste", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
column3: ["Clean and slice the mushrooms.", "Cook in the butter for 2 minutes.", "Puree in a blender until smooth.", "Add cream cheese and garlic powder; blend well.", "Chill and serve with crackers or vegetables."]

column2: ["1 c. sour cream", "1 c. self-rising flour", "1 stick melted butter"]
column3: ["Mix all together.", "Roll out and cut.", "Put in small muffin pans, greased with Crisco.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes."]

column2: ["1 c. sour cream", "1 stick butter", "1 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Combine all ingredients in a bowl.", "Bake in greased mini muffin tins at 450\u00b0 for about 15 minutes or until lightly brown. Makes 24 rolls."]

column2: ["2 Tbsp. seasoned flour", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Melt over low heat the butter.", "Stir slowly with flour until well blended.", "Stir in slowly the milk (or milk and light stock, or stock and cream).", "Simmer and stir the sauce until it has thickened and is smooth."]

column1: Press And Bake Cream Cheese Crust
column2: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)", "1/2 c. or 1 stick butter or margarine, softened", "1 c. sifted all-purpose flour"]
column3: ["Combine cream cheese and butter; blend well.", "Stir in flour. Refrigerate about 1 hour.", "Remove dough from refrigerator and press into bottom and up side of an ungreased 9-inch pie pan or dish."]

column2: ["2 c. flour (self-rising)", "1 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Mix together and drop on a cookie sheet by tablespoons.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 25 minutes."]

column2: ["1 egg", "1 piece bread", "1/2 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
column3: ["You will also need 1 small to medium water glass and 1 medium size skillet or frying pan."]

column2: ["2 c. flour", "1 c. milk", "1 c. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients and spoon into muffin pan.", "Bake at 370\u00b0 until done."]

column2: ["1 c. self rising flour", "1/2 c. milk", "2 Tbsp mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Mix well and spoon into greased muffin pan. Bake at 400\u00b0 until brown."]

column2: ["1 c. sour cream", "2 c. mayonnaise", "1 pkg. Original Hidden Valley Ranch dressing", "garlic salt"]
column3: ["Mix together very well."]

column2: ["1 medium carton cream cheese", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1 large pkg. lemon, orange or lime Jell-O (dry)"]
column3: ["Mix well, then add your fruit (mandarin oranges, pineapple either crushed or chunk).", "Mix gently.", "Refrigerate."]

column2: ["1/4 c. rice", "1/2 lb. bacon", "1 small onion"]
column3: ["Cook bacon until crisp; cook about 1/4 cup of rice and add onion.", "Pour some of the fat from the bacon in a frying pan and add the okra.", "Cook until it is done.", "Add the rice and onion and let simmer for awhile."]

column2: ["boneless chicken breasts", "garlic powder", "soy sauce"]
column3: ["Very easy!!", "Make 3 slices across the top of chicken.", "Pour the soy sauce over the chicken, using approximately 1/2 to 1 cup of soy sauce.", "Sprinkle a good amount of garlic powder over the top.", "Let sit for 15 to 20 minutes.", "Best if barbecued on gas grill.", "Also can broil."]

column2: ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened", "1 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Beat cream cheese and butter at medium speed with electric mixer 2 minutes or until creamy.", "Gradually add flour, beating at a low speed just until blended.", "Spoon dough into ungreased miniature muffin pans, filling full.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until golden.", "Serve immediately.", "Makes approximately 1 1/2 dozen."]

column2: ["2 cups flour", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 cup milk"]
column3: ["Mix above ingredients using tablespoon.", "Mix well.", "Grease muffin pan.", "Cook at 450\u00b0 until golden brown.", "Yields 12."]

column2: ["1 1/4 c. self-rising flour", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Mix together and", "pour in greased muffin tins.\tBake at 420\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes."]

column2: ["3 cans chicken broth", "4 chicken breasts, cut in bite size pieces", "1 1/2 to 2 c. rice (not instant)", "1 small onion"]
column3: ["Heat broth.", "Add chicken, onion and rice.", "Simmer until done. If too thick, add another can of chicken broth."]

column2: ["10 to 12 medium potatoes, salted, boiled and mashed", "1/4 lb. butter", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. half and half"]
column3: ["Beat all together.", "Bake, uncovered, for one hour."]

column2: ["4 sticks butter", "4 c. flour", "2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened"]
column3: ["Mix butter and cream cheese together, then add flour.", "Mix good.", "Chill overnight.", "Next day, roll out; spread nut mixture or whatever filling you want.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until top gets nice and brown."]

column2: ["1/2 lb. ground beef", "2 potatoes, cut into cubes", "3 tomatoes, chopped", "1 onion, chopped", "2 cloves garlic, chopped", "2 beef bouillon cubes"]
column3: ["Saute garlic with onions and tomatoes.", "Add 2 bouillon cubes. Saute well on medium heat.", "Add meat and potatoes with about 1/4 cup water.", "Let boil; continue adding water to make soup consistency."]

column2: ["2 lb. ground beef", "2 Tbsp. sour cream", "1 (24 oz.) jar salsa", "1 (16 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz"]
column3: ["Brown ground beef; drain.", "Add sour cream, salsa and Cheez Whiz.", "Mix well and cook on medium heat until thick.", "Great with tortilla chips."]

column2: ["5 to 5 1/2 c. peeled potatoes", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "8 oz. sour cream", "1/2 c. melted butter or oleo"]
column3: ["Cook potatoes and mash.", "Beat cream cheese in mixer until smooth.", "Add potatoes and rest of ingredients and beat until well mixed.", "Spoon into buttered casserole.", "Cover.", "Refrigerate overnight."]

column2: ["2 sticks butter or margarine", "1 c. sour cream", "2 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Melt butter.", "Add other ingredients.", "Put in ungreased muffin tins.", "Preheat oven to 450\u00b0.", "Bake 15 minutes or until golden."]

column2: ["2 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Use about 3 cups cooked or canned vegetables (green peas, carrots, etc.). Heat butter. Stir in flour.", "Add milk, stirring until smooth. Cook and stir until mixture is thick. Add salt and pepper, then add vegetables."]

column2: ["2 c. mashed potatoes", "1 egg", "1/4 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix together well.", "Shape into", "patties,", "like hamburgers. Fry in buttered skillet until", "golden brown.", "Serve with pancake syrup, gravy, etc."]

column2: ["1/2 stick butter", "1/4 c. sour cream", "1/2 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Combine butter and sour cream. Blend well. Add flour and mix well. Fill greased mini muffin cups 3/4 full. Bake at 425\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes."]

column2: ["1 large cucumber", "1 medium onion", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened"]
column3: ["Grate cucumbers.", "Squeeze water out.", "Grate onion; mix with cucumber.", "Add cream cheese to vegetables; mix well.", "Salt and pepper."]

column2: ["4 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 c. onion", "1 egg", "2 c. mashed potatoes"]
column3: ["Use leftover mashed potatoes from refrigerator.", "For every two cups potatoes, add 4 tablespoons flour, 1/2 cup onion and 1 egg. Stir ingredients and make into patties.", "Fry in skillet until brown on each side."]

column2: ["1 stick butter", "1 c. flour", "1 small pkg. cream cheese"]
column3: ["Mix crust ingredients; form into 24 balls.", "Line 24 small muffin tins by pressing dough around in each muffin tin."]

column2: ["1 slice bread", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 egg"]
column3: ["With a 2 1/2-inch round cutter, cut out a circle on the slice of bread.", "Melt butter in a heavy frying pan.", "Put in both pieces of bread.", "Cook over moderate heat until they begin to brown. Break an egg into the hole and sprinkle it with salt and pepper. Continue cooking until the bread is brown.", "Turn and brown the other side.", "Add butter as needed to keep the bread from sticking. Serve with the cut-out piece on top."]

column2: ["bread", "butter", "garlic salt"]
column3: ["Butter both sides of bread.", "Shake a small amount of garlic salt on both sides.", "Place in heated frypan until golden brown on both sides.", "Serve hot."]

column2: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "milk", "garlic salt"]
column3: ["Let cream cheese soften.", "Mix with mixer to make smooth and creamy.", "Add milk, a little at a time, until desired consistency. Season with garlic salt to taste."]

column2: ["7/8 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter", "1/4 c. milk", "2/3 c. grated cheddar cheese"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients in a bowl until a dough is formed. Pat out on wax paper or floured board until 1/4 thick. Cut in strips 1/2 inch wide and form into sticks 3 to 4 inches long. Place on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 400\u00b0 about 12 minutes, until golden brown."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Stir all ingredients well. Put into greased muffin tin.", "Bake at 400\u00b0.", "Brown as desired."]

column2: ["3 cloves garlic", "1 stick butter", "1 loaf French bread"]
column3: ["Soften butter.", "Smash garlic and mix together.", "Spread on bread and place in broiler until top is crisp and brown."]

column2: ["1 lb. round steak", "1/2 stick butter", "small onion", "small can mushrooms", "1/2 pt. sour cream"]
column3: ["Cut meat in serving pieces.", "Salt,", "pepper and flour meat. Brown in butter.", "Remove meat; saute onion and mushrooms in butter.", "Add sour cream and stir well.", "Place meat pieces in casserole.", "Pour sour cream mixture over meat.", "Cover and cook at 350\u00b0 for about 1 hour. This is a good recipe for deer steaks.", "It cuts the wild taste."]

column2: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1 small onion, chopped", "2 1/2 c. chicken broth", "1 lb. carrots, sliced", "2 c. diced potatoes", "1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Saute onion in butter.", "Add chicken broth, carrots and potatoes and simmer.", "Cook until vegetables are tender.", "Blend into a puree. Return to pan with milk.", "Reheat.", "Serve with a sandwich for a great lunch!"]

column2: ["6 to 8 potatoes", "1 c. sour cream", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese with chives", "butter"]
column3: ["Boil potatoes and mash with sour cream and cream cheese. Place in baking dish.", "Dot with butter.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

column2: ["4 to 6 potatoes", "1/2 onion", "4 cloves garlic", "1/2 stick butter"]
column3: ["Cube your potatoes.", "Cube your onions.", "Mince your garlic. Place all this in a microwave bowl with lid.", "Add a little salt and pepper.", "Cook at 4 minute intervals, stirring each time, until tender (3 or 4)."]

column2: ["fat (preferably butter)", "milk or milk and cream", "flour"]
column3: ["For thin sauce (per cup of liquid) use 1 tablespoon flour and 1 tablespoon butter."]

column2: ["1/4 lb. butter", "3 oz. cream cheese", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Cream butter and cheese.", "Add flour.", "Mix well.", "Form shells by rolling into balls and pressing with thumb into small muffins."]

column2: ["1/4 c. milk", "1 c. sour cream", "2 c. flour (self-rising)", "1 1/2 sticks melted butter"]
column3: ["Mix together and bake at 400\u00b0 in muffin pans for 20 minutes. Don't overcook.", "Makes 12.", "These are wonderful!"]

column2: ["6 or 8 potatoes, cooked until done, drained and mashed really fluffy", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/4 c. sour cream"]
column3: ["Add cream cheese and sour cream slowly to hot, mashed potatoes.", "Season with salt and pepper.", "Put in baking dish and brush top with melted butter.", "Sprinkle with paprika.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

column2: ["1 1/2 c. self-rising flour", "1 tsp. soft butter", "1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Blend flour, milk and butter in bowl.", "Mix well.", "Roll out on slightly floured wax paper.", "Cut with cutter.", "Place on slightly oiled pan.", "Bake at 450\u00b0 for about 15 minutes."]

column2: ["1 c. milk", "8 to 10 slices bread", "1 egg"]
column3: ["Mix egg and milk with fork. Place bread in mix, getting both sides moist. Place on preheated griddle. Let cook for 1 to 2 minutes and turn. Repeat until both sides are golden brown. Top as desired. Makes about 8 to 10 pieces."]

column2: ["2 lb. ground beef", "2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes", "1 c. rice"]
column3: ["Brown ground beef.", "Drain grease.", "Add tomatoes and rice. Cover; simmer until rice is tender.", "Really simple but delicious."]

column2: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. sifted flour"]
column3: ["Soften cream cheese and butter; mix well.", "Stir in flour. Mix; cover and refrigerate.", "Chill about 1 hour.", "Shape into small balls, about 1-inch.", "Press into the mini muffin tins."]

column2: ["3 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. real butter", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Let cream cheese and butter soften at room temperature; blend together.", "Stir in flour.", "Roll in a ball and chill in refrigerator for 1 hour.", "Shape into muffin tins like pie crust. (Do not grease tins.)"]

column2: ["1 can stewed tomatoes", "4 to 5 strips bacon", "2 Tbsp. flour", "6 biscuits (preferably homemade)"]
column3: ["Fry bacon and remove from pan.", "Add flour to pan over medium heat and stir constantly until light brown.", "Add tomatoes and 1 can of water; stir well and add more water as needed while simmering.", "Serve hot over biscuits.", "Serves 2 heartily with leftovers."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "8 oz. sour cream", "2 sticks butter"]
column3: ["Mix together with hands and put in muffin pans.", "Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350\u00b0 to 400\u00b0.", "Makes 12."]

column2: ["1 c. sour cream", "2 c. sifted self-rising flour", "2 sticks butter"]
column3: ["Mix", "cream", "and flour, then butter.", "Drop by tablespoon into small", "greased", "muffin tins.", "Bake in preheated 400\u00b0 oven 10 to 15 minutes."]

column2: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. Louis Kemp Crab Delights", "1/3 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. sliced celery", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion or green onion"]
column3: ["Cut Crab Delights in half or shred with electric mixer on low speed.", "Combine with mayonnaise, celery and onion.", "Makes 4 servings."]

column2: ["3 medium potatoes", "1 medium onion", "1 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. flour"]
column3: ["Cook potatoes and onion until done in saucepan with enough water to cover.", "Mix milk and flour until all flour lumps are dissolved; add to potatoes and onion.", "Cook until slightly thick. Add salt and pepper to taste."]

column2: ["2 sticks butter (not margarine)", "2 c. self-rising flour", "8 oz. sour cream"]
column3: ["Melt butter and cool.", "Mix with flour and sour cream.", "Drop into ungreased muffin tins.", "Bake in 325\u00b0 oven for twenty minutes."]

column2: ["1 egg", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1 small onion, chopped fine"]
column3: ["Mix egg with potatoes.", "Blend in onion; add flour and mix well.", "Spoon out mixture in a pan of flour and roll to coat both sides.", "Drop in skillet of hot oil and fry on both sides until brown.", "Any leftover meat pieces can be added to the mixture before browning."]

column2: ["1/2 c. cooked crumbled bacon (about 6 slices)", "1 c. sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. (3) tomatoes, seeded and chopped"]
column3: ["Combine all ingredients until well blended. Garnish with 1 tsp. bacon crumbs. Serve with bread or crackers."]

column2: ["2 spoons bacon grease", "1 spoon flour", "1/2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Melt grease and add flour; brown.", "Pour in milk; stir and add water to desired thickness."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Mix flour, mayonnaise and milk together. Bake in greased muffin tins until golden brown. Bake at 450\u00b0."]

column2: ["1 cup mashed potatoes", "1 egg beaten", "1 Tbsp. flour"]
column3: ["Mix together.", "Shape into patties.", "Fry in hot oil until brown, turning once."]

column2: ["3 potatoes", "evaporated milk (about 1 c.)", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 stick butter"]
column3: ["Cook potatoes on low with butter.", "While cooking, dissolve flour in milk.", "After potatoes are done, add milk mixture to potatoes.", "Stir until thickened."]

column2: ["leftover mashed potatoes", "1 onion, chopped", "flour"]
column3: ["Heat skillet over medium heat with grease.", "Mix potatoes, onion and flour to thicken.", "Spoon into hot skillet and fry, turning until both sides are brown."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour (if all-purpose flour is used, add 2 tsp. yeast)", "2 sticks butter (not margarine), softened", "1 c. sour cream (light sour cream doesn't taste as good)"]
column3: ["Grease muffin tins.", "Mix all ingredients together and bake in muffin tins on 425\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes.", "Add a little jam and you'll be licking your fingers."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "milk"]
column3: ["Add enough milk or water to flour and mayonnaise to make a thick batter.", "Cook in a greased muffin pan at 400\u00b0 or 450\u00b0 until done.", "Tastes great with butter and jelly."]

column2: ["12 lb. turkey", "1 medium onion", "1 stick butter or margarine", "1 small bell pepper (if desired)", "1 small stalk celery (may be substituted for or combined with pepper, according to taste)"]
column3: ["Wrap in foil and smoke 5 hours.", "Take off foil last hour to brown.", "If larger turkey is desired, smoke 30 minutes per pound."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 c. milk", "2 heaping Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Mix all together.", "Bake in greased muffin pan at 400\u00b0 for about 15 minutes.", "Makes 6."]

column2: ["8 to 10 potatoes, boiled, drained and mashed", "1 8 oz. pkg cream cheese, softened", "1/2 c. sour cream", "butter"]
column3: ["Combine cream cheese and sour cream. Add mashed potatoes gradually. Put in casserole and add butter on top. Refrigerate. Heat in 350\u00b0 oven for about 1 hour when needed."]

column2: ["1 medium onion, minced", "2 Tbsp. butter", "2 c. chicken broth", "1 c. uncooked rice"]
column3: ["Saute onion and butter in microwave until transparent.", "Heat broth and onions for 6 to 7 minutes on High.", "Add rice.", "Cook, covered, for 10 minutes on High.", "Allow to remain covered 10 minutes longer.", "Serves 4 to 6."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Mix the flour and the mayonnaise until flour is course.", "Add milk slowly until the flour can be rolled into a dough.", "You may not need all of the milk or you may have to add more.", "Roll dough and cut out your biscuits.", "Put the biscuits on a lightly greased pan and put them in the oven.", "Cook until done."]

column2: ["4 chicken breasts", "20 (yes 20!) garlic cloves", "1 stick butter", "French bread"]
column3: ["Melt butter in pan.", "Set aside.", "Place chicken skin-side-up in oven-safe pan.", "Pour melted butter over chicken; sprinkle whole or chopped garlic cloves on top.", "Turn chicken over in butter.", "Cover tightly and bake in oven for 1 1/2 hours at 350\u00b0.", "Eat with chunks of French bread dipped in garlic butter."]

column2: ["3 to 5 medium potatoes", "butter", "shredded cheddar cheese, optional", "onion, optional"]
column3: ["Peel and slice potatoes. Place in microwave safe casserole dish. Cover potatoes with butter and microwave for 5 minutes. Remove and stir. Place back in microwave covered for 15 minutes. Sprinkle cheese on top if desired. For added flavor, add chopped onion."]

column2: ["1 (1 lb.) loaf frozen bread dough or 1 pkg. frozen roll dough", "2 Tbsp. melted butter", "1/2 tsp. each: garlic powder, whole thyme, caraway seed, oregano and dill"]
column3: ["Let frozen dough thaw until pliable.", "Cut thawed loaf into 20 pieces.", "(If using roll dough, cut each roll in half.) Arrange in a lightly greased ring mold or tube pan.", "Mix melted butter and herbs and brush over dough. Let rise until doubled in size.", "Bake in a 375\u00b0 oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until golden brown on all sides.", "Remove from pan immediately.", "Serve hot or wrap in foil for reheating later.", "I usually thaw the amount of dough I think I'll need and then put in a large rectangular dish, depending on the number I need."]

column2: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Soften butter and cream cheese. Blend together.", "Add flour. Chill 1", "hour."]

column2: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1 pkg. Good Seasons garlic and herb salad dressing", "1 c. sour cream"]
column3: ["Spread 4 large slices of bologna or minced ham with softened cream cheese seasoned with onions or chives and mustard.", "Place slices together (like a layer cake).", "Spread cheese over top and sides; decorate with sliced olives.", "Chill.", "Cut into wedges."]

column2: ["1 stick unsalted butter", "3 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. Mother's Best self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Cream butter and cream cheese until light and fluffy.", "Add self-rising flour and mix well with fork until smooth.", "Refrigerate for about 10 minutes for easy handling. Roll or pat out dough 1/2-inch thick and cut with a small pastry or biscuit cutter.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet and bake in preheated 400\u00b0 oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Biscuits will not rise very much, but are very light and delicious.", "Makes 10 to 12 servings."]

column2: ["1 c. butter or margarine", "8 oz. sour cream", "2 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Soften butter and add sour cream.", "Mix until smooth.", "Add flour a little at a time; mix well.", "Drop 1 teaspoon in each mini muffin cup.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes."]

column2: ["3 cans kraut", "1 large onion, chopped", "3 c. grated potatoes", "1 (12 oz.) pkg. bacon"]
column3: ["Wash kraut one can at a time.", "Chop onion and add to kraut. Put in a heavy pot and cover.", "Add water just to top off kraut and boil on medium heat for 4 to 5 hours.", "You may have to add more water while cooking.", "Cook down dry.", "Grate potatoes.", "When kraut is cooked dry, place potatoes on top of kraut.", "Fry bacon.", "Pour hot bacon grease over kraut and potatoes.", "Crumble bacon on top of kraut and potatoes and simmer for about 30 minutes.", "Delicious with dried beans and corn bread."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "1 c. milk", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Mix thoroughly and fill greased muffin tins 1/2 full.", "Bake 12 to 15 minutes at 375\u00b0.", "Makes 12."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. (heaping) mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Preheat oven to 425\u00b0.", "Mix well (ingredients will be lumpy) approximately 25 strokes.", "Place in muffin tins, 1/2 full.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 for approximately 12 to 15 minutes or until golden brown."]

column2: ["1 c. self rising flour", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Mix well and spoon into greased muffin tins.", "Bake at 450 degrees for 10 minutes."]

column2: ["1/2 c. butter, softened to room temperature", "3 oz. pkg. cream cheese, softened to room temperature", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Put all the ingredients into a bowl and knead them with your fingers.", "Shape dough into golf ball sizes and set them on an ungreased cookie sheet.", "Flatten tops enough to make them look like biscuits.", "Bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until golden brown."]

column2: ["1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened", "1 pkg. (3 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 c. all purpose flour"]
column3: ["Beat butter and cream cheese until smooth. Add flour; mix until a soft dough forms. Cover; chill at least 1 hour or overnight. Shape dough into 1 inch balls. Place balls into cups of ungreased deluxe mini-muffin pan. Dip mini-tart shaper in flour; pressing into dough to form tart shell."]

column2: ["2 large potatoes peeled and diced", "1/2 onion diced", "1 can canned milk"]
column3: ["Cook together potatoes and onion in sauce pan covered with water until potatoes are mushy.", "Add milk and salt and pepper to taste."]

column2: ["5 lb. potatoes", "3 (6-inch) pieces celery", "1/2 small onion", "whole milk (enough to cover potatoes)"]
column3: ["Dice potatoes, onion and celery into large enough pot to cover with water by 1 inch.", "Bring to boil; simmer 1/2 hour."]

column2: ["1 loaf sliced bread", "1/2 lb. cream cheese, softened with milk, cinnamon and sugar mixture", "1 stick melted butter"]
column3: ["Cut crusts of bread off and roll out flat.", "Spread each slice with cheese and roll up.", "Dip into butter and in cinnamon and sugar.", "Chill and cut into bite sized pieces and freeze.", "Heat at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes.", "Do not defrost before baking."]

column2: ["1 stick butter", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. plain flour"]
column3: ["Mix together softened cream cheese and butter with flour in bowl.", "Chill, covered, for 1 hour.", "Shape into 24 (1-inch) balls. Press each dough ball over bottom and up the sides of an ungreased miniature muffin pan.", "Preheat oven to 325\u00b0."]

column2: ["6 medium potatoes", "1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream", "1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 stick butter"]
column3: ["Mash potatoes; add butter, sour cream and cream cheese.", "Bake 20 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

column2: ["3 1/2 c. self-rising flour", "2/3 c. butter flavored Crisco", "1 1/2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Mix the Crisco into the flour until crumbly.", "Add milk.", "Knead for about 1 minute on floured wax paper until the dough is no longer sticky.", "Roll out and cut with biscuit cutter.", "Bake on ungreased baking sheet for 8 to 10 minutes at 450\u00b0."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "2 sticks butter (margarine)", "1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream"]
column3: ["Mix butter and flour with pastry blender.", "Add sour cream. Drop 1/2 teaspoon pastry into tiny muffin pan.", "Bake at 450\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes.", "Makes approximately 45 to 50 very small biscuits."]

column2: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 lb. butter or margarine", "2 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix well; mold well in miniature muffin tins."]

column2: ["1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 end piece bread", "1 egg", "onion flakes", "ketchup", "3/4 to 1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Turn oven on to 350\u00b0.", "Take ground beef.", "Crumble the end piece of bread into ground beef.", "Add egg.", "Add several shakes of onion flakes, if desired.", "Use 3 to 4 squeezes of ketchup or until enough.", "Add milk.", "Mix together with hands or stir well with spoon.", "Put in glass dish and put in oven.", "Bake 45 minutes or until done.", "Drain grease from dish and top meat loaf with ketchup."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "1 c. whole milk", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Combine and mix ingredients.", "Drop into greased muffin pan. Bake at approximately 325\u00b0 or 350\u00b0 until brown."]

column2: ["1 c. milk", "2 c. self-rising flour", "4 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Mix well.", "Place in baking pan with large spoon.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until done."]

column2: ["bread slices", "1/4 c. melted butter", "garlic powder to taste"]
column3: ["Cut bread slices into 1-inch strips. Mix butter and garlic powder in a bowl.", "Dip bread in mixture.", "Roll in crushed cereal. Place on baking sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 5 minutes."]

column2: ["1 c. diced potatoes", "3/4 c. chopped onion", "1/3 c. chopped celery"]
column3: ["Make medium white sauce using Watkins cream soup; set aside. Simmer potatoes, onion and celery in 1 1/2 cups water in a covered 2-quart saucepan.", "Do not drain.", "Add 1/4 teaspoon Watkins dry mustard and a dash of Watkins black pepper to the medium white sauce; add to vegetables.", "Bring to a full boil, stirring constantly.", "Makes 6 servings."]

column2: ["1 c. sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 lb. bacon, fried crispy and crumbled", "tomatoes, chopped"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Toast desired bread and cut crosswise into triangle quarters for dipping (may trim bread crust)."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "2 tsp. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. milk (better with buttermilk)"]
column3: ["Stir all ingredients together.", "Pour in muffin tins.", "Bake until brown at 350\u00b0.", "Makes 6."]

column2: ["bacon or sausage grease", "3 heaping Tbsp. flour", "3 c. milk"]
column3: ["Warm skillet on stove top.", "Add enough grease to 3 heaping tablespoons of flour to wet flour.", "Let flour barely start to turn brown, and then add milk.", "Stir until thick.", "Salt and pepper to taste."]

column2: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 c. onion, chopped", "1 c. celery, chopped", "2 c. carrots, sliced", "2 c. potatoes, sliced"]
column3: ["Place beef in bottom of casserole. Add remaining ingredients in order given. Salt each layer. Top with 1 can cream of chicken soup and about 1/2 can of water. Cover casserole and bake 1 1/2 hours at 350\u00b0."]

column2: ["1/2 c. butter, softened", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Beat butter and cream cheese until smooth. Add flour to mix to form soft dough. Chill at least one hour or overnight. Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Place walnut-sized balls of dough into ungreased mini-muffin pan. Dredge a mini-tart shaper in flour and press each ball of dough to fill cup."]

column2: ["1 egg", "1 piece of bread", "butter"]
column3: ["Butter one side of the bread.", "Make a hole in bread.", "Place in pan.", "Crack egg inside of hole.", "Fry till egg is cooked.", "Salt and pepper to taste"]

column2: ["1 lb. ground beef, cooked", "1 large can whole tomatoes", "4 medium size potatoes"]
column3: ["Boil round slices of potatoes until almost done.", "Line bottom of casserole dish with ground beef.", "Put layer of potatoes on ground beef, then a layer of tomatoes. Do this until all ingredients are used.", "Pour juice from the tomatoes over all. Put lid on casserole and bake in preheated oven at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

column2: ["3 Tbsp. butter", "1 slice bread", "1 small egg"]
column3: ["Melt butter in a small frying pan.", "Using a biscuit cutter, cut a circle from center of bread slice.", "Fry bread until brown and crisp on one side, then turn over and break egg into circle.", "Fry over low heat until done.", "Use fried bread round to dip into egg when served."]

column2: ["2 c. flour", "1 1/2 sticks real butter (at room temperature)", "1 small carton sour cream"]
column3: ["Sift flour into bowl.", "Add soft (not melted) butter and sour cream.", "Blend together by hand.", "Roll out on wax or foil paper generously sprinkled with flour.", "Cut with small cutter and bake at 350\u00b0 for about 20 minutes on", "greased cookie sheet."]

column2: ["1 (8 oz.) Philadelphia cream cheese (room temperature)", "Pet evaporated milk", "4 to 5 cloves garlic"]
column3: ["Cream the Philadelphia cream cheese with Pet milk until soupy consistency. Squeeze garlic into mixture.", "Refrigerate until ready to serve.", "Additional Pet milk can be added if too thick. Serve with potato chips."]

column2: ["1/2 c. butter", "1 (4 oz.) cream cheese", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Combine ingredients and roll into balls.", "Place in muffin tin and spread balls to form crusts."]

column2: ["7 slices chopped bacon", "1 onion, chopped", "6 potatoes, diced", "2 qt. milk", "2/3 c. flour"]
column3: ["Fry bacon until half done, add chopped onions, fry until tender.", "Add 2/3 cup flour, stir until smooth.", "Add milk and stir until thick and low boil.", "Add potatoes."]

column2: ["4 slices French or sourdough bread, cut 1-inch thick", "butter or margarine, softened", "garlic salt"]
column3: ["Spread bread with butter or margarine.", "Sprinkle with garlic salt.", "Place bread slices, buttered side up, on broiler pan. Broil 3 to 4-inches from heat for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes.", "Makes 4 servings."]

column2: ["2 c. flour", "4 Tbsp. heaping mayonnaise", "1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Mix ingredients until pasty.", "Grease muffin tins; fill 1/2 to 3/4 full.", "Makes 12 muffins.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Mix all together.", "Mixture will be thick.", "Spoon into greased, large muffin cups (6).", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until brown."]

column2: ["1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. milk", "2 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients.", "Grease muffin tins.", "Put mixture in tins.", "Bake for 12 to 15 minutes at 400\u00b0.", "Makes 12."]

column2: ["12 slices bread", "8 slices bacon, cooked, drained and crumbled", "2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "12 asparagus spears, well drained", "melted butter"]
column3: ["Trim crusts from bread.", "Flatten bread.", "Blend cream cheese and bacon.", "Spread mixture on bread.", "Lay asparagus on each slice and roll up.", "Brush with butter and place under broiler until golden brown.", "Toast on both sides.", "Cut in half for smaller pieces."]

column2: ["6 to 8 c. peeled and sliced potatoes", "1 stick butter or margarine", "garlic powder to taste"]
column3: ["Peel and slice potatoes.", "Layer in a glass 9 x 13-inch baking pan.", "Slice the butter over the potatoes.", "Sprinkle with the garlic powder.", "Cover with aluminum foil and bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour or until done."]

column2: ["8 oz. sour cream", "2 sticks butter", "2 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Combine and bake for 20 minutes at 325\u00b0 or until done."]

column2: ["potatoes, sliced", "butter", "onion, chopped or grated"]
column3: ["Line a broiler pan with foil and dot the foil with butter. Spread potatoes and onions evenly over the foil.", "Cover with a lid of foil and bake for 1 1/2 hours at 350\u00b0.", "When half done, turn and re-cover until done.", "Uncover and let brown or crisp before serving."]

column2: ["4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts", "1 c. chicken broth", "2 c. sliced mushrooms", "1 c. sliced onion"]
column3: ["Place chicken in a baking dish.", "Arrange mushrooms and onion on top.", "Add chicken broth.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour or until chicken is tender."]

column2: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1 1/2 to 2 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. milk"]
column3: ["Melt butter over low heat in saucepan.", "Slowly add flour and blend for about 3 to 5 minutes.", "Stir in the milk slowly, stirring constantly.", "Cook and stir sauce with wire whisk or wooden spoon until thickened and smooth."]

column2: ["6 to 8 small potatoes", "1 pkg. Lipton onion dry soup mix", "1 stick butter, melted"]
column3: ["Scrub potatoes and cube (about size) for potato salad.", "Put all ingredients in bowl and mix together.", "Pour in 11 x 13-inch pan and bake at 450\u00b0 for 35 to 45 minutes.", "Stir about every 15 to 20 minutes."]

column2: ["2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Combine the ingredients, mix well and spoon into greased muffin tin.", "Bake in preheated oven at 400 degrees for about 12 minutes or until lightly browned.", "Makes 6 large rolls.", "Recipe may be doubled or tripled for more."]

column2: ["1/2 c. butter", "3 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 1/2 c. flour"]
column3: ["Work until all dough is smooth."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Add ingredients one at a time; mix until moist.", "Grease a muffin pan.", "Drop into muffin pan.", "Bake for 10 to 15 minutes."]

column2: ["6 medium potatoes, diced", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 onion, diced", "2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Add enough water to pan to cover potatoes.", "Add butter and onion.", "Cook until tender.", "Add milk.", "Salt and pepper to taste. Take 2 more tablespoons of butter and mix with enough flour to make crumbs the size of peas.", "Add to boiling soup."]

column2: ["4 to 6 skinless chicken breasts", "1 whole garlic clove", "1 lemon", "2 tsp. butter"]
column3: ["Boil chicken 15 to 20 minutes.", "Place in shallow pan.", "Smash lemon by rolling on counter; this smashes juice before cutting. Cut open and spread juice over chicken.", "You can scoop some lemon out of peel for extra zip!", "Smash garlic and smear over chicken. Let chicken set 15 minutes or longer."]

column2: ["5 potatoes", "1 egg", "1 c. flour (approximate)"]
column3: ["Shred potatoes with smallest side of grater.", "Add the egg and flour as needed for thickness.", "Blend together.", "Fry like you would a pancake. Sprinkle sugar on top and serve."]

column2: ["1 c. milk", "2 c. self-rising flour", "4 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Mix milk and flour and beat two minutes.", "Add mayonnaise to mixture.", "Put into greased muffin pan.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until brown."]

column2: ["1 1/2 c. self-rising flour", "butter or shortening", "milk"]
column3: ["Grease a 9-inch cake pan with butter or shortening.", "Mix flour with milk until mixture is consistency of thick pancake batter. Pour into pan.", "Set on stove burner on very low heat until puffy, then place in preheated oven at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients, spray muffin tins with Pam.", "Fill 2/3 full with batter.", "Bake at 450\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes."]

column2: ["1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach", "1 (8 oz.) sour cream", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1/2 tsp. chopped onion", "5 or 6 strips crisp-fried bacon, crumbled", "pinch of garlic salt"]
column3: ["Thaw and drain spinach.", "Combine ingredients.", "If you like, you may add chopped water chestnuts, drained.", "Mix well.", "Nabisco bacon thins really set this off."]

column2: ["1 c. flour", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "3 oz. pkg. cream cheese"]
column3: ["Mix together and form into 24 balls.", "Press into small muffin tins.", "If dough is too soft, chill it."]

column2: ["1/4 lb. butter", "1/4 lb. cream cheese", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix together well.", "Put pastry in small tins.", "Refrigerate overnight."]

column2: ["1 egg", "1 slice bread", "1 Tbsp. butter"]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 to 3/4 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "1 1/4 c. milk"]
column3: ["Stir all ingredients together to form a smooth mixture.", "Spoon onto a greased baking pan.", "Bake in a preheated 450\u00b0 oven until golden brown."]

column2: ["6 large potatoes or enough to fill bowl", "1 large onion", "1 qt. stewed tomatoes"]
column3: ["In casserole, layer potatoes and onions in alternate layers until full.", "Pour the stewed tomatoes over top; dot with butter. Add salt and pepper to taste.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 45 minutes, or until potatoes are tender."]

column2: ["2 sticks real butter", "2 c. self-rising flour, sifted", "8 oz. sour cream"]
column3: ["Cut butter into flour with pastry blender.", "Add sour cream. Mix until smooth.", "Drop by spoonful into greased muffin pans.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 until brown.", "Can bake in miniature muffin cups for party rolls.", "Good to serve with a salad plate."]

column2: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "mashed potatoes", "1 egg, well beaten"]
column3: ["Put in bowl and sprinkle with paprika.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

column2: ["2 lb. carrots, sliced and cooked", "1 small onion, chopped fine", "1 bell pepper, chopped fine", "1 rib celery, chopped fine"]
column3: ["Cook carrots 8 minutes and then drain.", "Mix together the rest of the ingredients and marinate overnight in the following sauce."]

column2: ["1 egg", "1/2 c. flour", "milk"]
column3: ["Gather a pan of pumpkin or squash blossoms when fully opened. Remove stamens and wash and drain the petals.", "Make a batter using 1 egg, flour and milk.", "Dip the blossoms in batter, then drop into deep hot fat.", "Serve as a vegetable.", "MMM good."]

column2: ["1 stick butter", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix and chill.", "Put chilled dough in small tart pans that have been sprayed with Pam.", "Roll into balls and press into pans."]

column2: ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese", "1 1/3 c. butter", "2 2/3 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix dough ingredients together, press into tassie pan cups. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "Cool."]

column2: ["1 large pkg. cream cheese", "1 pt. sour cream", "1 pkg. Good Seasons dressing (cheese garlic)"]
column3: ["Mix until smooth.", "Chill 3 hours (overnight).", "Serve with cut up vegetables."]

column2: ["1/4 lb. butter", "1 c. flour", "3 oz. pkg. cream cheese"]
column3: ["Work together and knead.", "Roll out and cut into approximately 24 squares.", "Press into small tart tins."]

column2: ["1/2 c mayonnaise", "1/2 c sour cream", "4-6 slices bacon, cooked & chopped"]
column3: ["Mix with mayonnaise, sour cream.", "Refrigerate overnight.", "Top with chopped tomatoes and lettuce.", "This is good for days.", "I make it sometimes without lettuce and use it for sandwich spread, especially for ham sandwiches."]

column2: ["potatoes", "bacon", "onion"]
column3: ["Potatoes have to be boiled.", "Bacon cut up in bits and onion cut up.", "Then fry together.", "Mash potatoes, add fried bacon and onion, salt and pepper and mix together."]

column2: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 stick butter", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Work together and chill.", "Make small balls; put in muffin tin and \"thumb out\"."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "2 sticks butter, melted", "8 oz. sour cream"]
column3: ["Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.", "Spoon into muffin tins.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 12 to 18 minutes."]

column2: ["1 pkg. tortillas (10 count)", "1 c. shredded Colby or Monterey Jack", "1 small onion or large, depending on your taste", "butter"]
column3: ["Take a taco shell, spread with butter on 1/2.", "Cover 1/2 with cheese, onion and peppers, if you desire.", "Zap on High in microwave for 1 minute or fry on grill until cheese is melted.", "Fold in half and cut in fourths.", "Serve immediately. Great served before a meal."]

column2: ["1 c. milk", "2 1/2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "2 c. flour"]
column3: ["Combine all ingredients together and mix well.", "Pour into a greased muffin tin.", "Bake in a 450\u00b0 oven for 10 to 15 minutes. Makes 6 large or 9 small rolls."]

column2: ["6 thick slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces", "1 c. minced onion", "3 medium potatoes, pared and cubed", "1 large turnip, pared and cubed", "6 c. chicken broth"]
column3: ["Fry bacon until crisp in Dutch oven.", "Remove bacon.", "Saute onion in bacon fat.", "Add potatoes, turnip and broth; simmer until done.", "Puree mixture in blender.", "Return puree to Dutch oven; heat to boiling.", "If desired, stir in sour cream."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1 stick butter"]
column3: ["Combine ingredients.", "Drop by teaspoonfuls onto baking sheet and cook at 350\u00b0 for 18 minutes."]

column2: ["3 Tbsp. butter or grease from chicken, etc.", "3 Tbsp. flour", "4 c. milk"]
column3: ["Melt butter or any grease you are using.", "Add flour to hot grease.", "Mix with spoon.", "Add mix and stir continuously with spatula.", "Add or decrease milk to your preference."]

column2: ["1 8 oz. package cream cheese, softened", "1/2 cup butter or margarine, softened", "1 cup self rising flour"]
column3: ["Beat cream cheese and butter at medium speed for two minutes or until creamy. Gradually add flour, beating at low speed just until blended."]

column2: ["8 oz. sour cream", "1 c. milk", "1/3 c. orange juice", "1 pkg. Jell-O vanilla pudding"]
column3: ["With", "electric\tmixer,\tblend", "pudding, milk and orange juice. Slowly", "add sour cream, mixing by hand.", "Refrigerate 1 hour before serving with your favorite fresh fruits."]

column2: ["2 lb. peeled potatoes", "1 egg", "5 Tbsp. flour"]
column3: ["Grate potatoes and allow to drip dry in fine sieve or cloth bag.", "Gently press out moisture.", "Let the leftover liquid settle; pour off the clear liquid at top and add the sediment (starch) to grated potatoes.", "Stir in egg and flour and work into a moist but firm dough.", "If it feels too mushy, adding a bit of flour won't hurt.", "Transfer dough to moist board; form walnut sized balls between floured hands and cook in boiling salted water.", "If you want, leave the dough mushy and spoon it out of bowl with a tablespoon into the boiling water."]

column2: ["1 c. sour cream", "1 stick butter or margarine, melted", "1 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Combine all ingredients in bowl.", "Stir until well mixed.", "Bake in small muffin tins at 450\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

column2: ["sliced bread", "butter", "egg, cheese or meat"]
column3: ["Trim crusts from bread.", "Butter one side of each slice.", "Press buttered side down in muffin cups.", "Bake in preheated 375\u00b0 oven for about 12 minutes or until lightly toasted.", "You can then fill these to make individual servings of any egg, cheese or meat dish."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "1 c. butter", "1 small carton sour cream"]
column3: ["Sift", "flour, cut butter into flour.", "Stir n sour cream. Drop by\tspoon onto baking sheet or place in small muffin tin pan. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown. Makes 4 to 6 servings."]

column2: ["6 medium potatoes", "3 or 4 medium carrots", "1 to 1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 small or 1/2 medium onion"]
column3: ["Spray skillet with Pam.", "Add abut 1/4 cup vegetable oil. Layer potatoes and carrots.", "Make ground beef into 4 to 6 patties and place on top.", "Salt and pepper to taste.", "Place thick sliced onion on top.", "Cover and let cook at low temperature for 45 minutes to 1 hour."]

column2: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. sour cream", "2 tsp. Dijon mustard"]
column3: ["Beat with electric mixer until well blended. Stir in 2 envelopes (1 box) McCormick collection spring vegetable.", "Cover and refrigerate 2 hours.", "Arrange fresh vegetable pieces into holiday shape."]

column2: ["1 lb. butter or margarine", "2 large pkg. (8 oz.) cream cheese", "4 c. flour"]
column3: ["Cream shortening.", "Mix in 1 package cream cheese at a time. Add flour.", "Continue mixing by hand until mixture works away from side of bowl. Cover with waxed paper.", "Place in refrigerator overnight.", "Roll a small portion at a time in a cool place on powdered sugar until 1/8-inch thick.", "Cut in squares or rounds. Fill with favorite filling (Solo in cans works well).", "Bake 10 to 15 minutes at 325\u00b0."]

column2: ["1 c. butter, softened", "1 c. sour cream", "2 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Combine butter and sour cream in bowl; mix well.", "Add flour; mix well.", "Drop by teaspoons into greased miniature muffin cups. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Makes 36 servings."]

column2: ["1 (3 oz.) cream cheese", "1/2 c. butter or oleo", "1 c. all-purpose flour"]
column3: ["Combine cream cheese and butter; blend in flour.", "Chill about 1 hour.", "Shape into balls about 1 inch in diameter and press into tiny lightly greased muffin tins."]

column2: ["1/2 c. butter, softened", "1 pkg. (3 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "1 c. all-purpose flour"]
column3: ["For tart shells, beat butter and cream cheese in 2 qt. batter bowl until smooth.", "Add flour, mix until a soft dough forms. Cover; chill at least 1 hour or overnight.", "Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Shape dough into 1-inch balls.", "Place balls of dough into cups of ungreased mini-muffin pan.", "Press dough to form tart shell."]

column2: ["1 pan corn bread", "bacon", "onion", "2 cans tomatoes"]
column3: ["Make pan of corn bread; let cool.", "Fry bacon and onion and drain.", "In a big bowl break up corn bread; add bacon and onion. Add tomatoes and mix well.", "Put into baking dish.", "Bake about 20 to 25 minutes in oven on about 350\u00b0."]

column2: ["1 slice bacon, cooked until crisp", "1/3 c. minced onion", "1/2 c. minced celery", "4 medium potatoes", "1 1/2 c. chicken broth", "2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Saute onion and celery until well cooked.", "Simmer first 5 ingredients for 10 minutes.", "Blend well in blender.", "Add milk, salt and pepper to taste and reheat for about 10 minutes.", "Serves 4."]

column2: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. butter", "1 1/2 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix cream cheese and butter thoroughly.", "Add flour and work until smooth.", "Chill for at least 30 minutes.", "Roll to 1/8-inch thickness.", "Cut with biscuit cutter.", "Fill with 1 teaspoon filling.", "Press edges together with fork and prick top to release steam.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake until lightly browned, about 15 minutes."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "1/2 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
column3: ["Mix flour and mayonnaise in mixing bowl.", "Add milk, a small amount at a time, mixing well.", "Spoon into well-greased muffin pan.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Makes six muffins.", "They are like rolls."]

column2: ["1 egg", "2 Tbsp. milk", "1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Roll out thin and cut.", "Great in homemade chicken noodle soup."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour (1 c. per 12 sticks)", "milk (enough to make a gooey dough; for more than 12, increase flour proportionally)", "melted butter"]
column3: ["Heat oven to 450\u00b0. Pour milk into flour. Stir to mix. Should be gooey, not stiff. Spoon onto a floured board. Lightly knead enough flour into dough until it can be patted into a rectangle about 8 to 9-inches by about 4-inches. Cut with a sharp knife (which you continue to run through the flour). Cut in half and again in halves until you have 12 breadsticks about 4-inches by 3/4-inch. Melt butter in an iron skillet. Roll sticks in butter and place in skillet. Bake about 10 to 15 minutes, until golden."]

column2: ["2 large c. cooked rice", "1 onion, roughly chopped", "4 oz. mushrooms, sliced and cooked", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "1 oz. butter"]
column3: ["Fry onion in butter.", "Add mushrooms and heat gently.", "Add soy sauce when hot and season with salt and pepper to taste."]

column2: ["6 medium-sized potatoes", "butter (size of walnut)", "1 onion, chopped fine", "2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Dice and cook the potatoes in salt water.", "Add butter, pepper and onion.", "When potatoes are tender, add milk.", "Let come to a boil."]

column2: ["1/2 c. milk", "1 egg", "3 c. flour", "1 stick plus 2 Tbsp. butter"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients and roll out to about 1/6 inch thick.", "Cut into 1 x 2-inch rectangles."]

column2: ["1 lb. carrots, julienned or sliced", "1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz", "1/2 stick butter (4 oz.)", "Durkee fried onion rings"]
column3: ["Cook carrots until almost tender.", "Add melted butter to Cheez Whiz, then fold in carrots.", "Pour into baking dish; top with onions.", "Bake at 300\u00b0 for about 15 minutes, or until onions are browned."]

column2: ["2 sticks butter or 1 stick margarine", "1 c. sour cream", "2 c. self-rising flour"]
column3: ["Combine ingredients.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes in a small muffin pan."]

column2: ["1 c. flour", "1 c. milk", "1 egg", "4 apples"]
column3: ["Mix first 3 ingredients, then peel and dice apples and add to mixture or slice and dip apples into mixture.", "Fry in hot oil. Drain on paper towels.", "Sprinkle with powdered sugar.", "Serve warm."]

column2: ["1 loaf frozen bread dough", "garlic salt", "butter"]
column3: ["Let dough thaw.", "Stretch into long loaf.", "Place on greased cookie sheet.", "Brush with butter and sprinkle with garlic salt. Let rise.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 30 minutes."]

column2: ["10 to 12 slices bacon, fried and crumbled", "1 c. sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise", "2 tomatoes, diced, seeded and drained"]
column3: ["Mix together.", "Chill several hours.", "Serve on cocktail rye or toasted white bread and cut off crusts; cut toast diagonally into fourths."]

column2: ["1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch original milk or buttermilk recipe", "1/2 c. mayonnaise (regular or light)", "1 c. plain, low-fat yogurt"]
column3: ["Stir salad dressing mix and mayonnaise together with whip; fold in yogurt and mix well.", "Chill.", "Makes 1 1/2 cups of dressing, approximately 16 to 19 calories per tablespoon."]

column2: ["3/4 c. sour cream", "3/4 stick melted butter", "1 c. self-rising flour", "1/4 c. milk"]
column3: ["Mix ingredients together.", "Bake in greased mini muffin tins at 450\u00b0 for about 12 to 15 minutes or until lightly browned.", "Best when eaten immediately.", "Easy to reheat in microwave."]

column2: ["2 c. self-rising flour", "2 Tbsp. (heaping) mayonnaise", "milk"]
column3: ["Mix flour, mayonnaise and enough milk to make paste.", "Put into a greased muffin pan.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 until golden brown."]

column2: ["8 to 10 potatoes", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. sour cream"]
column3: ["Cook potatoes until tender.", "Drain.", "Peel.", "Beat softened cream cheese, sour cream and potatoes until light and fluffy (season to taste with garlic salt and chives).", "Spoon into 2-quart casserole. Brush with softened butter; sprinkle with parsley, bacon bits and paprika.", "Brown at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes (longer if refrigerated ahead of time).", "Serves 8."]

column2: ["1 c. self-rising flour", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise (not salad dressing)", "3/4 c. milk"]
column3: ["Spray pan with Pam.", "Mix all of the ingredients together and fill pan about 3/4 full.", "Bake in a 400\u00b0 or 425\u00b0 oven until brown. Makes 6 to 8."]

column2: ["4 or 5 medium squash", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 egg", "1/2 c. milk"]
column3: ["Slice squash and boil until tender. Drain and mash with fork. Add egg, flour and milk, mixing well. Salt and pepper to taste. Spoon mixture into frying pan with melted butter.", "Fry until browned."]

column2: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1 c. milk", "3 Tbsp. to 1 c. flour"]
column3: ["Stir butter and milk together.", "Add flour to preferred thickness."]

column2: ["1 1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. finely chopped pickles (sweet or dill)", "2 Tbsp. grated onion", "1/2 tsp. garlic powder or to taste"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients well; chill.", "Store in airtight container. Keeps very well in refrigerator for weeks."]

column2: ["1 C. grated sharp cheddar cheese", "1 small onion chopped very fine", "2 Tbsp. sour cream", "2 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "3 Tbsp. warm evaporated milk"]
column3: ["Grate cheese.", "When cheese is at room temperature, combine with other ingredients.", "Mix until smooth enough to spread on crackers.", "Garnish with tiny crisp bits of bacon."]

column2: ["1/2 lb. cream cheese", "2 c. flour", "1/2 lb. butter or 1/4 lb. butter and 1/4 lb. margarine"]
column3: ["Cream butter and cheese; sift in flour.", "Mix and chill overnight.", "Roll thin; cut into squares.", "Fill squares with pureed stewed apricots, prunes or jam.", "Bake in 450\u00b0 oven until lightly browned.", "Remove from pan; sprinkle with confectioners sugar."]

column2: ["2 c. mashed potatoes", "2 Tbsp. melted butter", "4 Tbsp. flour"]

Cut into rounds or triangles.", "Cook in slightly greased pan for 3 minutes on each side, pricking with a fork.", "Makes about 20 cakes. Delicious with sausage or bacon."]

column2: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1 cucumber, cut fine", "2 to 3 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "2 to 3 strips bacon (crisp)", "1 Tbsp. onion"]
column3: ["Soften cream cheese. Mix in mayonnaise, onion and crumbled bacon until smooth. Stir in cucumbers. Chill well. Serve with crackers."]

column2: ["1/2 c. flour", "1 whole egg", "2 sticks salted butter (room temperature)"]
column3: ["Mix all ingredients together and knead until well mixed and smooth."]

column2: ["3 lb. potatoes", "5 cans chicken broth (Swanson)", "1 large onion, diced", "1 can evaporated milk", "3 Tbsp. flour or cornstarch"]

column2: ["stale French bread, diced", "melted butter or olive oil", "garlic powder to taste"]

column2: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 c. sifted flour"]

column2: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 onion, diced", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. milk"]

column2: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (8 oz.) jar salsa", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. sour cream"]
column3: ["Mix all until smooth.", "Refrigerate at least 1 hour.", "Serve cold with tortilla chips."]

column2: ["1 c. flour (self-rising)", "1 c. milk", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing"]
column3: ["Combine", "all", "ingredients", "in", "mixing", "bowl.", "Mix well. Grease a 6 cup muffin tin.", "Drop by tablespoon into tin.", "Fill each tin 2/3 full.", "Bake in 425\u00b0 oven for 10 minutes or until done. (Toothpick", "will come out clean when a roll is pricked, if done.)"]

column2: ["5 c. self-rising flour", "3 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "3 c. milk (any type)"]
